rows.label: qst000902_msg0001
rows.name:
Thanks a lot.
You really saved our hides there.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0002
rows.name: I suppose I should introduce myself!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0003
rows.name:
I am Ragi!
I'm in charge of this sorry bunch of
mercenaries!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0004
rows.name:
As you can see, we're still kind of small
time. It's early days for us.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0005
rows.name:
But someday, our names are going to
ring out all over Invidia.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0006
rows.name:
So, we'll take on pretty much any kind
of job right now, just to get a bit of...
Oh, crap!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0007
rows.name:
Ah, it's just...we were meant to be
bodyguarding for a Nopon trader
called Dororo. But...

rows.label: qst000902_msg0008
rows.name:
Those Ignas... They attacked us and
made off with our client!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0009
rows.name:
Ah...it's pretty embarrassing for a
bodyguard, letting the employer get
captured...

rows.label: qst000902_msg0010
rows.name:
Bah...I'd love to get out there and give
those Ignas what for...

rows.label: qst000902_msg0011
rows.name:
We'd need to tune up our gear
first though...and make a plan.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0012
rows.name:
I'm not sure that we have time for that
though. Dororo'll be lizard-lunch by the
time we get set up.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0013
rows.name: Really?! You'll help?

rows.label: qst000902_msg0014
rows.name: Yeah, you're right.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0015
rows.name:
That furry little dude's life is on the
line. I just gotta swallow my pride here.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0016
rows.name: I'll leave it to you guys.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0017
rows.name:
Those Igna bastards took Dororo back
to their lair.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0018
rows.name:
The lair...? It's past Minnet
Terrace, in Badfella's Cave Fort.

rows.label: qst000902_msg0019
rows.name:
If you go now you should catch 'em up.
Go! Save Dororo!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0101
rows.name:
The Ignas' lair is in Badfella's Cave
Fort!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0102
rows.name:
It's past Minnet Terrace, then
straight on. You've still got time to
catch 'em!

rows.label: qst000902_msg0103
rows.name:
Please promise me you'll help that
little Nopon fella out.
